marklogic.body: Yeah the twins got what they deserved when the Heat was turned up and it wasn't two on one then they run home they are spongebob's and they could not buy class. I know its a parents right to defend their children but those two were just fowl and I didn't understand why they had a whole hour dedicated to dissing the other girls without being called out on their crap so one sided and if they get a spin Off I won't be watching hated them and their parent as well dad was a wanna be and mom just poor white trash yeah I said it.
